title: Summer of Sin
description: When Chloe's jet-setting parents leave her behind for a summer, wanting her to "grow up" and get a job before moving off to college, she is dreadfully disappointed. But things start looking up as soon as her aunt's impossibly handsome ex, once known as "Uncle James," offers to help her spend her last free summer wisely...and Chloe realizes she might be growing up in an altogether unexpected way...
author: Ella Blythe
